definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, people with alcoholic liver disease often have hepatitis C as well.
sentences.chinese: 不知什麼原因，人們往往與酒精性肝病和丙型肝炎。

sentences.english: Methods The model of alcoholic hepatic disorder was established by feeding alcohol liquor.
sentences.chinese: 方法白酒灌胃法建立酒精性肝病大鼠模型。

sentences.english: To investigate the protective effect of ethanol sediments from Codonopsis lanceolata on alcoholic hepatic injury.
sentences.chinese: 研究輪葉黨蔘水提醇沉物對酒精性肝損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: NAFLD can lead to liver failure.
sentences.chinese: 非酒精性脂肪肝會導致肝功能衰竭。

sentences.english: To investigate the protective effect of mussel polysaccharide on alcoholic hepatic injury in mice.
sentences.chinese: 探討貽貝多糖對小鼠酒精性肝損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: Iron load can accelerate alcohol liver damage.
sentences.chinese: 鐵負荷可促發酒精性肝損傷。

sentences.english: Conclusion Yinchen-Wuling powder can effectively prevent and cure alcoholic liver injury of rats.
sentences.chinese: 結論茵陳五苓散能有效預防和治療大鼠酒精性肝損傷。

sentences.english: Methods Rat model of alcoholic liver disease were established by alcohol administration.
sentences.chinese: 方法酒精灌胃法制備大鼠酒精性肝病模型。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of XiaoZhiJianGanYin on non-alcohol adiposis hepatica.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討消脂健肝飲治療非酒精性脂肪肝的作用機制。

sentences.english: Antis-lipid Peroxidation of Zhiganle in Rats with Fatty Liver;
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥脂肝寧預防酒精性脂肪肝的作用機理。

sentences.english: So it goes to show that "Hugan dripping pill" is an ideal medicine for treating the AFLD.
sentences.chinese: 是治療肝鬱脾虛夾溼熱型酒精性脂肪肝理想藥物。

sentences.english: This is one side of our better understanding in recent studies of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們對非酒精性脂肪肝理解更深入的一個方面。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse clinical features of nonalcoholic fatty liver.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析非酒精性脂肪肝病的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the treatment of alcoholic cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解酒精性肝硬變的治療與轉歸。

sentences.english: But in recent years, the alcoholic liver cirrhosis formation rate also had the obvious trend of escalation.
sentences.chinese: 但近年來，酒精性肝硬化發生率也有明顯的上升趨勢。

definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)

pinyin: jia3 zhuang4 xian4 gong1 neng2 kang4 jin4
